00004 inline Mtx inverse(Mtx &A) 
00005 {
00006     Mtx AInv; // [3][3];
00007     AInv(0,0) = A(1,1)*A(2,2)-A(1,2)*A(2,1);
00008     AInv(0,1) = A(0,2)*A(2,1)-A(0,1)*A(2,2);
00009     AInv(0,2) = A(0,1)*A(1,2)-A(0,2)*A(1,1);
00010     AInv(1,0) = A(1,2)*A(2,0)-A(1,0)*A(2,2);
00011     AInv(1,1) = A(0,0)*A(2,2)-A(0,2)*A(2,0);
00012     AInv(1,2) = A(0,2)*A(1,0)-A(0,0)*A(1,2);
00013     AInv(2,0) = A(1,0)*A(2,1)-A(1,1)*A(2,0);
00014     AInv(2,1) = A(0,1)*A(2,0)-A(0,0)*A(2,1);
00015     AInv(2,2) = A(0,0)*A(1,1)-A(0,1)*A(1,0);
00016     REAL fDet = A(0,0)*AInv(0,0) + A(0,1)*AInv(1,0) +
00017         A(0,2)*AInv(2,0);
00018     if (fabs(fDet) < ZeroTolerance)
00019     {
00020        throw;
00021     }
00022 
00023     REAL fInvDet = ((REAL)1.0)/fDet;
00024     for (int iRow = 0; iRow < 3; iRow++)
00025     {
00026         for (int iCol = 0; iCol < 3; iCol++)
00027         {
00028             AInv(iRow,iCol) *= fInvDet;
00029         }
00030     }
00031   return AInv;
00032 }
00033 
00034 inline REAL Mtx::Determinant() 
00035 {
00036   Mtx &m=*this;
00037   return
00038     m(0,3) * m(1,2) * m(2,1) * m(3,0)-m(0,2) * m(1,3) * m(2,1) * m(3,0)-m(0,3) * m(1,1) * m(2,2) * m(3,0)+m(0,1) * m(1,3)    * m(2,2) * m(3,0)+
00039     m(0,2) * m(1,1) * m(2,3) * m(3,0)-m(0,1) * m(1,2) * m(2,3) * m(3,0)-m(0,3) * m(1,2) * m(2,0) * m(3,1)+m(0,2) * m(1,3)    * m(2,0) * m(3,1)+
00040     m(0,3) * m(1,0) * m(2,2) * m(3,1)-m(0,0) * m(1,3) * m(2,2) * m(3,1)-m(0,2) * m(1,0) * m(2,3) * m(3,1)+m(0,0) * m(1,2)    * m(2,3) * m(3,1)+
00041     m(0,3) * m(1,1) * m(2,0) * m(3,2)-m(0,1) * m(1,3) * m(2,0) * m(3,2)-m(0,3) * m(1,0) * m(2,1) * m(3,2)+m(0,0) * m(1,3)    * m(2,1) * m(3,2)+
00042     m(0,1) * m(1,0) * m(2,3) * m(3,2)-m(0,0) * m(1,1) * m(2,3) * m(3,2)-m(0,2) * m(1,1) * m(2,0) * m(3,3)+m(0,1) * m(1,2)    * m(2,0) * m(3,3)+
00043     m(0,2) * m(1,0) * m(2,1) * m(3,3)-m(0,0) * m(1,2) * m(2,1) * m(3,3)-m(0,1) * m(1,0) * m(2,2) * m(3,3)+m(0,0) * m(1,1)    * m(2,2) * m(3,3);
00044 } 
00045 
00046 inline void dswap(REAL &X, REAL &Y) { REAL tmp(X); X=Y; Y=tmp; }
00047 inline Mtx Mtx::Transpose() const
00048 {
00049   Mtx m(*this);
00050   //int idx = 0;
00051   //for ( int row = 0; row < order; ++row )
00052   //  for ( int col = 0; col < order; ++col, ++idx )
00053   //    m.data[ idx ] = data[ row + ( col * 4 ) ];
00054 
00055    for ( int i = 0; i < order; ++i) {
00056        for ( int j = i +1; j < order; ++j)
00057          dswap( m( i, j), m( j, i)); // need a swap function not provided here
00058      }
00059   return m;
00060 
00061 }
00062 // Creates a scale matrix
00063 inline Mtx Scale( const Vec &scale )
00064 {
00065   Mtx m;
00066   m.data[ 0 + 0 ] = scale.x;
00067   m.data[ 4 + 1 ] = scale.y;
00068   m.data[ 8 + 2 ] = scale.z;
00069   return m;
00070 }
00071 
00072 // Creates a translation matrix
00073 inline Mtx Translate( const Vec &moveAmt )
00074 {
00075   Mtx m;
00076   m.data[ 0 + 3 ] = moveAmt.x;
00077   m.data[ 4 + 3 ] = moveAmt.y;
00078   m.data[ 8 + 3 ] = moveAmt.z;
00079   return m;
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline Mtx RotateX( REAL ang )
00083 {
00084   REAL s = ( REAL ) sin(  ang  );
00085   REAL c = ( REAL ) cos(  ang  );
00086 
00087   Mtx m;
00088   m.data[ 4 + 1 ] = c; m.data[ 4 + 2 ] = -s;
00089   m.data[ 8 + 1 ] = s; m.data[ 8 + 2 ] = c;
00090   return m;
00091 }
00092 
00093 inline Mtx RotateY( REAL ang )
00094 {
00095   REAL s = ( REAL ) sin(  ang  );
00096   REAL c = ( REAL ) cos(  ang  );
00097 
00098   Mtx m;
00099   m.data[ 0 + 0 ] = c; m.data[ 0 + 2 ] = s;     
00100   m.data[ 8 + 0 ] = -s; m.data[ 8 + 2 ] = c;   
00101   return m;
00102 }
00103 
00104 // Creates an euler rotation matrix (by Z-axis)
00105 
00106 inline Mtx RotateZ( REAL ang )
00107 {
00108   REAL s = ( REAL ) sin( ang  );
00109   REAL c = ( REAL ) cos(  ang  );
00110 
00111   Mtx m;
00112   m.data[ 0 + 0 ] = c; m.data[ 0 + 1 ] = -s;
00113   m.data[ 4 + 0 ] = s; m.data[ 4 + 1 ] = c;
00114   return m;
00115 }
00116 
00117 // Creates an euler rotation matrix (pitch/head/roll (x/y/z))
00118 inline Mtx Rotate( REAL pitch, REAL head, REAL roll )
00119 {
00120   REAL sp(  pitch  ), cp (cos(  pitch  ));  // REAL sp(  pitch  ) is this an error?
00121   REAL sh(  sin(  head  )), ch ( cos(  head  ));
00122   REAL sr (  sin(  roll  )),  cr (cos(  roll  ));
00123 
00124   Mtx m;
00125   m.data[ 0 + 0 ] = cr * ch - sr * sp * sh;
00126   m.data[ 0 + 1 ] = -sr * cp;
00127   m.data[ 0 + 2 ] = cr * sh + sr * sp * ch;
00128 
00129   m.data[ 4 + 0 ] = sr * ch + cr * sp * sh;
00130   m.data[ 4 + 1 ] = cr * cp;
00131   m.data[ 4 + 2 ] = sr * sh - cr * sp * ch;
00132 
00133   m.data[ 8 + 0 ] = -cp * sh;
00134   m.data[ 8 + 1 ] = sp;
00135   m.data[ 8 + 2 ] = cp * ch;
00136   return m;
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 // Creates an arbitraty rotation matrix
00141 inline Mtx MakeRotationMatrix( const Vec &dir, const Vec &up )
00142 {
00143   Vec x = Cross( up, dir ), y = Cross( dir, x ), z = dir;
00144   Mtx m;
00145   m.data[ 0 ] = x.x; m.data[ 1 ] = x.y; m.data[ 2 ] = x.z;
00146   m.data[ 4 ] = y.x; m.data[ 5 ] = y.y; m.data[ 6 ] = y.z;
00147   m.data[ 8 ] = z.x; m.data[ 9 ] = z.y; m.data[ 10 ] = z.z;
00148   return m;
00149 }
00150 
00173 inline Matrix MakeQRotationAroundAxis(Vector v, double dRadian)
00174 {
00175   Matrix m;
00176   double a=v.x, b=v.y, c=v.z;
00177   double q0=cos(dRadian/2.0);
00178   double q1=sin(dRadian/2.0)*a;
00179   double q2=sin(dRadian/2.0)*b;
00180   double q3=sin(dRadian/2.0)*c;
00181   m.data[0]=q0*q0+q1*q1-q2*q2-q3*q3;
00182   m.data[1]=2 * (q1*q2-q0*q3);
00183   m.data[2]=2*(q1*q3+q0*q2);
00184 
00185   m.data[4]=2* (q2*q1+q0*q3);
00186   m.data[5]=q0*q0-q1*q1+q2*q2-q3*q3;
00187   m.data[6]=2*(q2*q3-q0*q1);
00188 
00189   m.data[8]=2*(q3*q1-q0*q2);
00190   m.data[9]=2*(q3*q2+q0*q1);
00191   m.data[10]=q0*q0-q1*q1-q2*q2+q3*q3;
00192   return m;
00193 }
00194 // Transforms a vector by a matrix
00195 inline Vec operator * ( const Vec& v, const Mtx& m )
00196 {
00197   return Vec(
00198     m.data[ 0 ] * v.x + m.data[ 1 ] * v.y + m.data[ 2 ] * v.z + m.data[ 3 ],
00199     m.data[ 4 ] * v.x + m.data[ 5 ] * v.y + m.data[ 6 ] * v.z + m.data[ 7 ],
00200     m.data[ 8 ] * v.x + m.data[ 9 ] * v.y + m.data[ 10 ] * v.z + m.data[ 11 ] );
00201 }
00202 
00203 // Transforms a vector by a matrix
00204 inline Vec operator * ( const Mtx& m, const Vec& v )
00205 {
00206   return Vec(
00207     m.data[ 0 ] * v.x + m.data[ 1 ] * v.y + m.data[ 2 ] * v.z + m.data[ 3 ],
00208     m.data[ 4 ] * v.x + m.data[ 5 ] * v.y + m.data[ 6 ] * v.z + m.data[ 7 ],
00209     m.data[ 8 ] * v.x + m.data[ 9 ] * v.y + m.data[ 10 ] * v.z + m.data[ 11 ] );
00210 }
00211 
00212 // Multiplies a matrix by another matrix
00213 
00214 inline Mtx operator * ( const Mtx& a, const Mtx& b )
00215 {
00216   Mtx ans;
00217   for ( int aRow = 0; aRow < 4; ++aRow )
00218     for ( int bCol = 0; bCol < 4; ++bCol )
00219     {
00220       int aIdx = aRow * 4;
00221       int bIdx = bCol;
00222 
00223       REAL val = 0;
00224       for ( int idx = 0; idx < 4; ++idx, ++aIdx, bIdx += 4 )
00225         val += a.data[ aIdx ] * b.data[ bIdx ];
00226       ans.data[ bCol + aRow * 4 ] = val;
00227     }
00228     return ans;
00229 }

00231 extern bool Solve3 (Mtx & A, Vec & B,  Vec & X);
00232 
00233 // Perspective is along the z-axis with the eye at +z.
00234   
00235 inline Mtx  Perspective (Mtx &m, REAL d)
00236 {
00237   Mtx tmp(m);
00238   double  f = 1. / d;
00239   for (int i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++) {
00240     tmp.data[i*4+3] += tmp.data[i*4+2]*f;
00241     tmp.data[i*4+2]  = 0;
00242   }
00243   return (tmp);
00244 }
